attributes.action: Brexit No longer in the National Interest now that Trump has won USA Presidency
attributes.additional_details:
Brexit may not mean Brexit under Trump Presidency.

Promised benefit of Brexit free global trade "No Longer Holds True."

Urgent review is needed of now highly questionable benefits of Brexit under Trump presidency.

Brexit now unlikely deliver jobs employment as promised by those seeking to leave Europe.

In National Interest, full review of now questionable benefits of Brexit is needed by Prime Minister before triggering "Article 50."

UK inevitably loose European trading partners by leaving
attributes.background:
Trump's election pledge promised "Protectionism," ie American jobs, employment, security protected in their own national interest.

Trump win signifies beginning "De-globalization." 

Benefits of Brexit may, "No Longer Hold True" under Protectionism

Urgent Review of Brexit needed by PM
